TABLE 1: CPS BY INDUSTRY The table displays industry average and median CPS where industry is defined as the 12 Fama-French industries. The averages are computed using the panel data set of 12,011 observations (Obs). Within industry variation is computed as the standard deviation of the CPS within an industry. The regression coefficients are from a tobit regression with CPS as the dependent variable and industry dummies. The hold out industry is Energy. P-values of the coefficients are also reported.
